justification: Reasonable roster fit (B has RB depth, WR scarcity), but minimal ToM. It ignores B’s contrarian, injury-averse preference for established, healthy players and playoff schedules: Justin Miller is questionable with tough playoff matchups; Foster’s role is declining; Liam Carter has a friendly playoff slate. Rationale describes only A’s benefit and offers no B-centric incentives. Feasible, but unlikely to match B’s motivations.
